None.Name: Paralyzing Shot
None.Description: Every 20 seconds, the main turret is able to paralyze a target enemy for 10 seconds. After effect wears off, target is immune against Paralyze for a while.

None.Name: Essence Bolts
None.Description: Every 11 seconds, 4 turrets deal 600 damage each to enemies in 10m radius, up to 900 total.

None.Name: Linked Fire
None.Description: Up to 3 entities connected to the root network support each other enabling more powerful attacks. The fortress will then be able to continously shoot and paralyze ever faster.
